workDescription: Add advanced search functionality with multiple filter types (category, price range, location, ratings) and sort options. Users currently struggle to find specific items in the growing catalog.

context.userProblem: Catalog has grown to 50,000+ items. Basic keyword search returns too many results. Users give up and leave site.
context.businessValue: Reduce search abandonment rate from 40% to 20%. Increase conversion rate by 15%.
context.currentState: Simple keyword search only. No filters. Sort by relevance only.

rabbitHoles: Search performance with multiple active filters
Filter combination logic and edge cases
noGos: Don't do semantic search or NLP
Don't redesign the entire results page

successCriteria: Search results update in under 2 seconds
Filter UI works well on mobile
No empty result surprise (show counts before applying)

constraints: Can't change search index structure mid-cycle
approach: Use existing search API with filter parameters
Cache filter options to reduce API calls

designConsiderations.mobilePattern: Bottom sheet or full-screen filter modal
interactions: Show result counts per filter option

rolloutStrategy.phase1: Release to 10% of users for 1 week
rolloutStrategy.fallback: Feature flag to roll back if needed

notes: Shows complete 6-week cycle with typical e-commerce feature
Demonstrates balancing user experience and technical constraints
Good example of scoping with performance considerations
Practical example of working with existing infrastructure
